messages.title: Labour Voice
messages.content: A personal message from Huw Thomas to the voters discussing the importance of the election and the need for change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour intends to grow the economy by supporting small businesses.
Labour will raise living standards while bringing the deficit down fairly.
Labour wants to tackle climate change with 1 million green jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Improving living standards in rural Wales
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has plans for improving living standards in rural Wales.
Labour commits to fighting to protect the NHS from Tory/Lib Dem broken promises.

issues.environment: 1 million green jobs to tackle climate change.
issues.health: Protecting the NHS from Tory/Lib Dem broken promises.

leaflet.personalStatement: Huw Thomas details his connection to the local area, having been born and brought up in Aberystwyth.

politicalExperience.achievements: Details his commitment to fighting for Ceredigion and the changes he believes are necessary.

quotes.text: Labour will raise living standards while bringing the deficit down fairly.

images.caption: Photos of Huw Thomas and supporters, as well as Labour branding and campaign messages.
